alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Huron; Richland; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Richland, southern Huron, southeastern Seneca, northern Ashland, northeastern Crawford and southwestern Lorain Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Washington, or 17 miles north of Bucyrus, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Willard, New London, Plymouth, New Washington, Bloomville, Savannah, Polk, Chatfield, Sullivan, Greenwich, Attica, North Fairfield, Bailey Lakes, Rochester, Nova, Nankin and Shenandoah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Ohio. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
